name: Abhishek Gupta
bio: Abhishek leads Protize with a focus on building reliable, high-performance digital products. He partners closely with clients to define clear outcomes, drive delivery, and ensure long-term scalability.

name: Karan Bohra
bio: Karan architects and delivers scalable backend systems and cloud-native services. He focuses on clean system design, performance, and production reliability across complex projects.

name: Manil Malhotra
bio: Manil leads engineering execution and helps teams ship features with strong code quality. He enjoys mentoring developers and improving performance, testing, and development workflows.

name: Ishan Baisoya
bio: Ishan bridges business goals and engineering execution by translating requirements into clear user stories and workflows. He ensures alignment, clarity, and measurable outcomes throughout delivery.

name: Jayshrilal Pandit
bio: Jay builds modern web applications with a focus on performance and secure integrations. He works across frontend and backend to deliver clean, maintainable features.

name: Jatin Jayal
bio: Jatin designs and implements cloud infrastructure that is secure, scalable, and cost-efficient. He supports deployments, observability, and reliability for production systems.

name: Alok Sharma
bio: Alok develops end-to-end features with a strong focus on user experience and engineering quality. He enjoys building responsive UIs and robust APIs for real-world business needs.

name: Alankrit Agrawal
bio: Alankrit works on analytics and data-driven automation to help teams make better decisions. He builds pipelines, dashboards, and models that turn raw data into actionable insights.

name: Sidharth Mehra
bio: Sidharth designs clean, accessible interfaces and design systems that scale. He collaborates closely with engineers to ensure consistent UI, great UX, and smooth product experiences.
